scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series consists of books, periodicals, pamphlets, slip opinions, journal articles, and other printed materials that Reed maintained, likely as part of his own personal library. Some materials contain autographs and other inscriptions, underlining, marginalia or other annotations.

The series is divided into nine sub-series: Addresses; Legal books; Legal journals; Supreme Court print materials; Other printed legal materials; Books,various; Journals, various; Pamphlets, various; Other publications, various.
